Package Week5Bootcamp.edu.monash.fit2099.bids

Class Bid

java.lang.Object
Week5Bootcamp.edu.monash.fit2099.bids.Bid
public class Bid
extends java.lang.Object
This is a Bid class that stores each bid. This class is important for BidsManager

29/08/2021
Version:

Yo Kogure

  • Constructor Details

    • Bid

      public Bid​(int newBidId, Buyer newBuyer, double newBidPrice, java.lang.String newBidDate) throws BidException
      this constructor
      Parameters:
      newBidId - integer showing Bid ID
      newBuyer - Buyer object showing the buyer who made the bid
      newBidPrice - double value showing the Price we have to make
      newBidDate - string showing the date of the bid
      Throws:
      BidException - gives exception when newBidPrice and newBidDate are out of format/range

      setter for bid price
      Parameters:
      price - double value showing price
      Returns:
      true if price in range(greater than or equal to 0), and false otherwise

      Returns:
      true if format is correct, false otherwise
